sentences.en: A tremor had gone through his bowels.
sentences.cn: 他的肠子刮过了一阵战栗.

sentences.en: An uncontrollable tremor shook his mouth.
sentences.cn: 他的双唇控制不住地颤抖.

sentences.en: He felt a tremor in his arms.
sentences.cn: 他感到胳膊不由自主地颤动。

sentences.en: He felt a tremor of apprehension.
He had a mild nervous tremor.
sentences.cn: 他有轻微的神经颤抖症.

sentences.en: He tried to conceal his distress, but the tremor in his voice was unmistakable.
sentences.cn: 他尽力隐藏悲痛, 但是颤抖的声音却无疑表明了一切.

sentences.en: Mr. Lindsay faced the difficulties without a tremor.
sentences.cn: 林德喜先生毫不战栗地面对困难.

sentences.en: News of 160 lay-offs had sent tremors through the community.
sentences.cn: 裁员160人的消息在社区中引起了波动。

sentences.en: Scobie thought with a tremor of self - disgust.
sentences.cn: 斯考比的心震颤了一下,感到一阵对自己的厌恶.

sentences.en: She was in a tremor of delight all afternoon.
The dangerous, excitable tremor was still in her voice.
sentences.cn: 她说起话来还是因为害怕及激动而颤抖。

sentences.en: The name struck across in his brain with a pleasant glowing tremor.
sentences.cn: 这名字在他脑海里一闪,叫他心旌飘摇,浑身发烧,觉得怪舒服的.

sentences.en: The tremor was centred in the Gulf of Sirte.
sentences.cn: 微震的震中位于苏尔特湾。

sentences.en: There was a slight tremor in his voice.
sentences.cn: 他的声音略微有点儿颤抖。

sentences.en: There was a slight tremor in his voice.
There was a tremor in his voice.

words.tran_cn: 发抖地；震颤地；歪斜地；过分敏感地
震颤的东西；发抖的人；摇尾鸟

trans.tran_cn: 震颤，战栗，震颤声，大地的轻微震动
trans.tran_en: If an event causes a tremor in a group or organization, it threatens to make the group or organization less strong or stable
